articles.content: Lululemon shares fell on Monday after the retailer said earnings and revenue for its fiscal fourth quarter will likely come in at the low end of estimates due to staffing shortages and shortened stor… [+1379 chars]

articles.title: New Oriental laid off 60000 staff after China's education crackdown, founder says - Reuters
articles.description: China's New Oriental  dismissed 60,000 employees and saw operating income plunge by 80% after Beijing enforced new sweeping rules on the country's private education industry that barred for-profit tutoring last year, according to its founder.
articles.content: BEIJING, Jan 10 (Reuters) - China's New Oriental dismissed 60,000 employees and saw operating income plunge by 80% after Beijing enforced new sweeping rules on the country's private education industr… [+1545 chars]
